meanings.definition: A type of waterproof boot typically made of rubber.
meanings.sent1: She wore her gumboots to keep her feet dry in the rain.
meanings.sent2: The farmer put on his gumboots before heading out to the muddy fields.
meanings.sent3: The clown slipped on oversized gumboots, causing everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: His gumboots were like shields against the relentless downpour.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow gumboots stood out in the sea of black shoes.

meanings.definition: Boots worn to protect the feet from water and mud.
meanings.sent1: During the hike, she relied on her gumboots to keep her feet clean.
meanings.sent2: The children happily splashed in puddles with their colorful gumboots on.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue stuck to the sole of his gumboots.
meanings.sent4: Her gumboots were like loyal companions on every outdoor adventure.
meanings.sent5: The sound of raindrops hitting the gumboots was oddly soothing.
